title: Mila Mergi
description: The mountain now called Mila Mergi was called Ilimeru in Assyrian texts of the 8th century B.C. The identification is provided by an Assyrian rock relief dating to the reign of Tiglath-pileser III. The mountain is located ca. 25 kilometers northwest of Dohuk in northern Iraq.

properties.description: The given coordinates are based on the Helsinki Atlas.
properties.title: Representative Location of Mila Mergi after the Helsinki Atlas
